Empresas: ativas por 6+ meses, receita mensal mnima de 15.000, sem inadimplncias recentes. A pontuao de crdito  verificada automaticamente via bureaus de crdito (Experian, Equifax). Os casos so analisados individualmente."},{question:"Como so calculadas as taxas de juros?",answer:"Nossas taxas so calculadas por um algoritmo que analisa vrios fatores: sua pontuao de crdito, durao do emprstimo, valor emprestado, renda e despesas, histrico de pagamento e sade financeira (para empresas). As taxas variam de 0,5% a 9,0% TAE dependendo do perfil e tipo de emprstimo. Nossas taxas esto entre as mais competitivas do mercado graas  nossa rede de parceiros financeiros."},{question:"Existem taxas de solicitao ou taxas ocultas?",answer:"Transparncia total: exibimos todas as taxas desde a simulao. Taxas de solicitao: 0 a 150 dependendo do tipo de emprstimo. Sem taxas de reembolso antecipado. Sem taxas mensais de gesto. A TAE (Taxa Anual Efetiva) inclui todos os custos para fcil comparao com outras ofertas."},{question:"Como calcular minha capacidade de emprstimo?",answer:"Sua capacidade de emprstimo depende da sua taxa de endividamento que no deve exceder 40% da sua renda lquida. Frmula: (Renda mensal  0,40) - Encargos de crdito existentes = Pagamento mensal mximo disponvel. Nosso simulador online calcula automaticamente sua capacidade de emprstimo e sugere valores apropriados. Voc pode ajustar a durao para modular os pagamentos."},{question:"Posso obter um emprstimo com baixa pontuao de crdito?",answer:"Sim, aceitamos vrios perfis. Pontuaes aceitas a partir de 500-560 para certos produtos. De dossiers worden per geval bestudeerd."},{question:"Hoe worden de rentetarieven berekend?",answer:"Onze tarieven worden berekend door een algoritme dat verschillende factoren analyseert: uw kredietscore, de looptijd van de lening, het geleende bedrag, uw inkomsten en lasten, uw terugbetalingsgeschiedenis en de financile gezondheid (voor bedrijven). De tarieven variren van 0,5% tot 9,0% JKP volgens profiel en type lening. Het JKP (Jaarlijks Kostenpercentage) omvat alle kosten voor een gemakkelijke vergelijking met andere aanbiedingen."},{question:"Hoe bereken ik mijn leencapaciteit?",answer:"Uw leencapaciteit hangt af van uw schuldgraad die 40% van uw netto-inkomsten niet mag overschrijden. Formule: (Maandelijks inkomen  0,40) - Bestaande kredietlasten = Maximaal beschikbare termijn. Onze online simulator berekent automatisch uw leencapaciteit en stelt u aangepaste bedragen voor. U kunt de looptijd aanpassen om de termijnen te moduleren."},{question:"Kan ik een lening krijgen met een lage kredietscore?",answer:"Ja, we accepteren verschillende profielen. Scores geaccepteerd vanaf 500-560 voor bepaalde producten. hSt(e){const{socket:t,connected:n}=fB(),r=rs(),{data:i=[]}=vke(e),[a,o]=k.useState({}),{data:l}=ut({queryKey:["chat","unread","user",e],queryFn:async()=>{const d=await fetch(jt(`/api/chat/unread/${e}`),{credentials:"include"});if(!d.ok)throw new Error("Failed to fetch unread counts");return d.json()},enabled:!!e,staleTime:1/0,refetchOnMount:!0});return k.useEffect(()=>{if(l){const d={};l.forEach(({conversationId:p,count:m})=>{d[p]=m});const u=Object.values(d).reduce((p,m)=>p+m,0);console.warn("[CHAT NOTIFICATIONS]  API REFETCH happened! This OVERWRITES socket updates. Total:",u,"Counts:",d),o(d)}},[l]),k.useEffect(()=>{if(!t||!n||!e)return;const d=h=>{r.setQueryData(["chat","messages",h.conversationId],b=>b?[...b,h]:[h])},u=h=>{console.log("[CHAT NOTIFICATIONS] Socket chat:read-receipt received:",h),r.invalidateQueries({queryKey:["chat","messages",h.conversationId]}),r.invalidateQueries({queryKey:["chat","conversations","user",e]}),console.log("[CHAT NOTIFICATIONS] Invalidated messages and conversations cache (NOT unread counts)")},p=h=>{console.log("[CHAT NOTIFICATIONS] Socket chat:unread-count received:",h),o(b=>{const x={...b,[h.conversationId]:h.count},v=Object.values(x).reduce((w,C)=>w+C,0);return console.log("[CHAT NOTIFICATIONS] Unread counts updated. New total:",v,"All counts:",x),x}),r.invalidateQueries({queryKey:["chat","conversations","admin"],exact:!1})},m=async h=>{console.log("[CHAT NOTIFICATIONS] Socket unread_sync_required received for user:",h.userId),h.userId===e&&(console.log("[CHAT NOTIFICATIONS] Refetching unread counts due to sync event"),await r.refetchQueries({queryKey:["chat","unread","user",e]}),await r.refetchQueries({queryKey:["chat","conversations","user",e]}))},f=async h=>{(e===h.newAdminId||e===h.previousAdminId)&&(await r.refetchQueries({queryKey:["chat","unread","user",e]}),await r.refetchQueries({queryKey:["chat","conversations","user",e]}),await r.refetchQueries({queryKey:["chat","conversations","detail",h.conversationId]}),await r.refetchQueries({queryKey:["chat","messages",h.conversationId]}))},y=async h=>{console.log("[CHAT NOTIFICATIONS] Socket conversation:created received:",h),await r.refetchQueries({queryKey:["chat","conversations","user",e]})};return t.on("chat:new-message",d),t.on("chat:read-receipt",u),t.on("chat:unread-count",p),t.on("unread_sync_required",m),t.on("conversation_assigned",f),t.on("conversation:created",y),()=>{t.off("chat:new-message",d),t.off("chat:read-receipt",u),t.off("chat:unread-count",p),t.off("unread_sync_required",m),t.off("conversation_assigned",f),t.off("conversation:created",y)}},[t,n,e,r]),{totalUnreadCount:Object.values(a).reduce((d,u)=>d+u,0)}}function
